name: multi-backend-chat
description: Lightfast Multi-Backend Chat Example - demonstrates Lightfast agents across different backend frameworks

scripts.test:backends: npm run test:node && npm run test:express && npm run test:hono && npm run test:fastify
scripts.test:node: curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/chat/test || echo 'Node.js server not running'
scripts.test:express: curl -X POST http://localhost:3002/api/chat/test || echo 'Express server not running'
scripts.test:hono: curl -X POST http://localhost:3003/api/chat/test || echo 'Hono server not running'
scripts.test:fastify: curl -X POST http://localhost:3004/api/chat/test || echo 'Fastify server not running'
